intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) N2K product. This product provides detailed Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) data for over 4,700 grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe for the years 2006, 2012, and 2018. The manual describes the product's characteristics, methodology, potential applications, quality assessment procedures, and technical specifications, enabling users to effectively utilise the N2K data for monitoring and assessing habitat conservation status using high-resolution satellite data.
keywords: Mapping and Assessment of Ecosystems and their Services (MAES)
ETRS89 Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area projection
